New Records: Trent Boult became the sixth New Zealand player to take 200 ODI wickets
Key Match Events: Mushfiqur Rahim scored a half-century to guide Bangladesh to a total of 245-9 against New Zealand
Shakib Al Hasan contributed 40 runs in a 96-run partnership with Mushfiqur Rahim
Trent Boult dismissed Liton Das off the first ball of the match and Towhid Hridoy in the 38th over
Miscellaneous Highlights: Captain Kane Williamson returned to action after missing New Zealand's first two wins due to a knee injury
Bangladesh opened their World Cup campaign with victory over Afghanistan before losing to England
